titles.title: Real MEAT Act of 2023
Real Marketing Edible Artificials Truthfully Act of 2023
Real MEAT Act of 2023

A bill to amend the Federal Food, Drug, and Cosmetic Act to ensure that consumers can make informed decisions in choosing between meat products such as beef and imitation meat products, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.

committee.name: Senate Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions

bill.summary:
Real Marketing Edible Artificials Truthfully Act of 2023 or the Real MEAT Act of 2023
This bill prohibits the sale of any imitation meat food product unless its label includes (1) the word imitation, and (2) a statement that clearly indicates the product is not derived from or does not contain meat.
